items.title: Former prosecutor Jack Smith, who led criminal probes on Trump, is reportedly under investigation by Office of Special Counsel
items.description: Republican Senator Tom Cotton had reportedly asked the agency to investigate whether Smith's actions had been designed to influence the 2024 election.

items.title: OPEC+ agrees in principle to another bumper supply increase
items.description: Saudi Arabia and its partners plan to ratify the addition of 548,000 barrels a day for next month when they hold a video conference on Sunday.

items.title: The Federal Reserve’s power: Congress giveth and Congress can taketh away
items.description: "Don't forget, our Federal Reserve is not at all a part of our Constitution. It's a creature of the U.S. Congress, created by the Federal Reserve Act ...

items.title: I’m a former governor, an education leader, and mother to recent college grads. Gen Z alarms me with their financial illiteracy
items.description: Gen Z is the least financially literate generation on record. I see it in the workforce and with my own kids graduating college.

items.title: I’m a cybersecurity CEO who advises over 9,000 agencies and Sam Altman is wrong that the AI fraud crisis is coming—it’s already here
items.description: We may soon recognize a "Moore's Law"-style principle for AI that I call “Altman’s Law”: every 180 days, AI capabilities double.
